title: Register a community amateur sports club

details.description: Why you might register a sports club you run as a community amateur sports club and what you'll need to do
details.body:
If you run a sports club, registering as a community amateur sports club may save your organisation money.

HM Revenue & Customs has details about:

  • eligibility and how to register as a community amateur sports club
  • tax reliefs for community amateur sports clubs
  • how Gift Aid could work for your club
  • tax on trading and business activities if you register
  • tax returns for community amateur sports clubs
details.alternative_title: Tax advantages for registering as a community amateur sports club (CASC)
